meanings.definition: An antifungal medication used to treat various fungal infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed fluconazole to treat the fungal infection on my skin.
meanings.sent2: She picked up her fluconazole prescription from the pharmacy.
meanings.sent3: The fungus threw a party on my foot, but fluconazole crashed it!
meanings.sent4: Fluconazole is like a superhero fighting off the evil fungi invaders in my body.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember fluconazole as the fungus fighter that saved the day.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a prescription medication commonly known as Diflucan.
meanings.sent1: My friend takes fluconazole, which is the same as Diflucan.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained that fluconazole is the generic version of Diflucan.
meanings.sent3: When I heard 'fluconazole,' I thought it was a fancy word for 'Diflucan'!
meanings.sent4: To me, fluconazole is like the undercover name for Diflucan.
meanings.sent5: Remember, fluconazole is just another name for Diflucan at the pharmacy.
